title: Caerphilly byelection result live: Plaid Cyrmu beats challenge from Reform UK to win pivotal Welsh parliament vote
summary: A party advocating for Welsh independence has successfully taken a constituency from Labour in recent elections. They faced a strong challenge from Reform UK but managed to maintain their seat. This victory underscores growing support for independence in Wales.

title: Helen Goh’s recipe for forest floor cake | The sweet spot
summary: A Halloween cake offers a fun decorating experience that could make you reluctant to cut into it. Its spooky design adds to the festive spirit of the season. However, the temptation of savoring the first bite might eventually win you over.

title: The crimewave sweeping Britain? Illegal houses in multiple occupation | Aditya Chakrabortty
summary: Guardian columnist Aditya Chakrabortty discusses a scandal involving a healthcare management organization (HMO) that highlights the complicity of both the private sector and public institutions in wrongdoing. He emphasizes that the widespread nature of the guilt reflects broader issues within modern Britain. The situation underscores a troubling intersection of corporate malfeasance and governmental negligence.

title: Why the climate crisis is especially bad news for frightened flyers
summary: There are three main types of turbulence affecting air travel: clear air turbulence, thermal turbulence, and mechanical turbulence. Recent changes in the atmosphere are exacerbating these conditions, leading to more severe turbulence during flights. This volatility poses challenges for pilots and can affect passenger comfort.
